title: Riot's stance on Muramana is bullshit.
body:
>[CONTEXT: Riot Wrekz noted they are "Changes to Muramana are not an Ezreal nerf, they are accessibility improvements to remove management gameplay from an item."]

If this is a direct quote,

Then Riot really REALLY need to think about their decision making. This is absolutely stupid. 

Anyone with more than two brain cells can manage Muramana just fine. If Riot is nerfing Muramana they need to straight out state it.
